remarks: Define the class of all Banach spaces.  A Banach space is a normed vector space such that both the vector space and the scalar field are complete under their respective norm-induced metrics.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
statement: df-bn $p |- Ban = { w e. ( NrmVec i^i CMetSp ) | ( Scalar ` w ) e. CMetSp } $.
